"Matoi": "Thank you so much! That view was very impressive!"

"Hehe, you're welcome.
I'm glad you liked it. How about you,
<%me>?"
"Haa... If only I could have seen that view with the one I love like you did, Matoi..."

"Huh?! W-we're just partners!
...Asuna, does that mean the one you like is...?"

"When I look at him, I know that no matter what darkness I'm facing, he'll always be there to save me.
...He's just that kind of guy."

"That's right...
<%me> saved me from the darkness too.
We're the same that way!"

"Hehe...
I'm glad we became friends, Matoi. I think we've got a lot to talk about."
